description: Square array A(n, k), n, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals; for any number n with runs in binary expansion (r_w, ..., r_0), let p(n) be the polynomial of a single indeterminate x where the coefficient of x^e is r_e for e = 0..w and otherwise 0, and let q be the inverse of p; A(n, k) = q(p(n) + p(k)).
